name: Ser Kevan Lannister
description: If you are attacking, all of your participating Footemen (including supporting Lannister Footmen) add +2 combat strength instead of +1.

name: Tywin Lannister
description: If you win this combat, gain two Power tokens.

name: Cersei Lannister
description: If you win this combat, you may remove one of the losing oppopent's Order tokens from anywhere on the board.

name: Tyrion Lannister
description: You may cancel your opponent's chosen House card and return it to his hand. He must then choose a different House card to reveal. If he has no order House card in hand, he cannot use a House card this combat.
